"天に浮かびし遥かな大地":
"Dear <%me>,
I hear you're able to explore the
floating continent. Matoi's been talking
about you so excitedly, but she seems to
be showing particular interest in the
Skyscape of Amduscia. Could you bring her
back a souvenier? The stones there may
give us more clues about her past.
※Objetivo Nv.38+ Dragonkin.
Skyscape area only."
